nodes.text: The Dark Edge Dancetorium was a building that was located in the city Tolea Biqua on the planet Genarius. It was originally used as a dancing facility, but eventually trends changed and the building was abandoned. It was later occupied by a smuggling gang led by the fallen Jedi Zelice Sturm, which used the Dancetorium as a hideout, and during the Clone Wars, the Heroes of Cularin traveled to the base and confronted Sturm and her gang.
